title: CLEAR_PED_TASKS
content:
0xE1EF3C1216AFF2CD0xDE3316AB// ClearPedTasks
void CLEAR_PED_TASKS(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: Ped id. Use PlayerPedId() for your own character.Clear a ped's tasks. Stop animations and other tasks created by scripts.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for CLEAR_PED_TASKS
ClearPedTasks(ped)
